data.name: Rebooting Rural Economy : Policy Perspective
data.summary:
Key TakeAways
Policy initiatives to ensure cash transfer to smallholders and affordable/easy credit to medium and large farmers to meet their requirements
Policy to put cash into the hands of daily wage earners and landless labourers in the rural economy to ease their plight
